title: GONE
lyrics: Tone I thought that you'd remember, I t’s hard for me to blame you O h, yeah O h, yeah, yeah I see you changed your number, I gave you all of me, O h, yeah, yeah O h, yeah, yeah I just wanna be the one But to you we're already done Tell me, why'd you have to hit and run me? Now I'm all alone cryin' ugly Y ou broke my heart just for fun Took my l ove and just left me numb Now it's 8:00 in the morning H ate in the morning (All because of you) Another story that's sad and true?
